title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Freedom Of Information Act
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Freedom Of Information Act              Freedom Of Information Act       Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) regulations, instructions, and general information can be found at the Department of Interior's FOIA page. FOIA Office for the National Capital Region: National Park Service FOIA Officer 1100 Ohio Drive, S.W. Washington, DC 20242 202-619-7177 202-619-7302 (FAX) Monocacy National Battlefield Office of the Superintendent 4632 Araby Church Road Frederick, MD 21704 301-696-8650 301-662-3420 (FAX)  To request an accident report from Monocacy National Battlefield, download the Freedom of Information Act Request Form (MS Word format)
